scripts.deploy-production: npm run build && cp robots.txt build/robots.txt && cp google-website-ownership-verification build/googlea8a7a42d156ca88d.html && cd build && mv index.html 200.html && surge . --domain nettipuoskari.surge.sh
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run build && cp robots.txt build/robots.txt && cp google-website-ownership-verification build/googlea8a7a42d156ca88d.html && cd build && mv index.html 200.html && surge . --domain nettipuoskari-staging.surge.sh
